skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he was undone by a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow, excruciating inventiveness. His victims suffer far beyond their brief mortal coil as Thresh wreaks agony upon their souls, imprisoning them in his unholy lantern to torture for all eternity.

skins.name: Deep Terror
skins.lore: “If there really was a kingdom beneath the sea, it must have been destroyed long ago. How else do you explain the revenants that prey upon these shores? How else does that thing—Thresh—exist, trapping our souls in his accursed diving bell?”

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during a Worlds event.

skins.name: Blood Moon
skins.lore: A demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Thresh's insatiable urge to torture and kill is fueled by thousands of vengeful spirits drawn to his lantern. Entire villages are left slaughtered in his wake, their blood staining the land for decades.

skins.name: SSW
skins.lore: Honoring Mata's winning performance as Thresh during the 2014 World Championship.

skins.name: Dark Star

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

skins.lore: A cosmic nightmare who worships the all-consuming Dark Star, Thresh vows to feed the whole of existence to his “god” until all matter, time, and thought are erased. His work will be complete when nothing remains, freeing him to finally leap into the singularity and become one with the end of the universe.

skins.name: High Noon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.lore: An ancient devil who stalks the great expanses of the Old West, Thresh's cruel visage is burned into the minds of all living things who fear the day he will come to claim their souls. His arrival spells doom for any settlement, its residents flayed and left to rot in the sun.

skins.name: Pulsefire
skins.lore: As head of the Remembrancers, Thresh usually remains behind the scenes pulling the chains of time rather than stepping into the stream himself. Yet recent events have caused him to leave his temporal citadel, bringing his pulsefire lantern to bear.

skins.name: Prestige Pulsefire
skins.lore: As paradoxes multiply and more rogue agents rebel against the grasp of the chrono-enforcers, Thresh, as commander of the Rembrancers, takes matters into his own hands. He must not yield control of time to these interlopers… nor to the growing Praetorian threat.

skins.name: FPX

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: Honoring Crisp's winning performance as Thresh during the 2019 World Championship.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: An ancient demon of obsession, Thresh delights in tormenting the spirits of those he deems as flawed, but blossoming with potential. He haunts the spiritual afterlife as a supreme collector of souls, tempting the dead away from their path to salvation until they are trapped for eternity within their own memories.

skins.name: Unbound
skins.lore: With every soul the Ruination seized, Thresh's lantern burned brighter. He had planned for this moment, after all: the chance to scour far beyond the Shadow Isles, the Mist's reach so much greater than his own. Reaping all he had so meticulously sown, Thresh was at last unbound from the shackles of the isles. He had forgotten how good it feels to have skin...

skins.name: Steel Dragon

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.lore: The Steel Dragon, happiest curled up in its cavernous archive amidst its treasures, needed someone with a talent for acquiring esoteric new treasures—and its eye fell on Thresh. Honored to assist, Thresh's limitless appetite for acquisition warped into obsession. Now he stops at nothing to acquire what he wants, justifying his cruelty in the name of his benefactor.

skins.name: Prestige Pulsefire (2022)
skins.distribution: Given to players who owned the original skin prior to patch 12.5
skins.lore: As paradoxes multiply and more rogue agents rebel against the grasp of the chrono-enforcers, Thresh, as commander of the Rembrancers, takes matters into his own hands. He must not yield control of time to these interlopers… nor to the growing Praetorian threat.

skins.name: Lunar Emperor

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.lore: Some are destined to rule. Others hear only echoes of glory, knowing nothing of the sacrifices that must be made! You must put your empire before EVERYTHING... even the lives of your subjects. The Emperor Thresh still guides his people, their souls forever safe, though their bodies were washed away. Someday, he'll heal his broken empire. All he needs is a kind empress' helping hand.

skins.name: Winterblessed

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

skins.lore: Thresh, Sylas, and Camille laughed as the Aurora surged within them, until the laughs turned to screams! The raw power of the Aurora was too much, killing the inventor and dancer and leaving only a corrupted Thresh behind. Believing himself to be the rightful new Polaris, he raised his weapon, ready to doom Senna... when suddenly, Lucian appeared!

skins.name: Janitor

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.lore: There aren't many places, let alone stock brokerage firms, that will hire an ethically questionable, skull-faced custodian named Thresh, but Mundo wouldn't be a trillionaire if he didn't know a good bet when he saw one. Who better to clean up dirty money than a demon janitor?
